EmailTemplate.name: 17.Core.AirFrame.none.N.G.E.12204.AirFrame Network Planning.Email 2 - Nokia Clou
EmailTemplate.subject: Speed up your journey to the cloud with Nokia
EmailTemplate.textOnly: ${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Nokia Cloud Design Center Maximize your cloud transformation with telco expertise If you’re planning a move to the cloud, we offer telco expertise on everything from modelling network capabilities to optimizing cloud environments. We can also help you speed up your innovation cycle and launch new services quicker. Find out more. Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
